wordpressPage.title: HXL downloads
wordpressPage.content:
To create HXL data, all you need is a spreadsheet application, such as Excel or Google Sheets.

To help with processing and analysing HXL data, we have created a collection of free software tools. We will add to this list as new software becomes available:

HXL 1.0 beta core schema
A HXL-formatted schema for validating HXL datasets (e.g. using the scripts in libhxl-python, below). You can create your own schema for specific applications. (direct CSV download).
HXL design assets
Royalty-free logos and other graphic assets for HXL, including the HXL postcard.
HXL tools and Python library
Public-domain command-line tools and Python software library for working with HXL data.
HXL proxy
Public-domain source code for a Python-based online service for analysing and visualising HXL-encoded data. You can see this code running live in the HXL proxy.
HXL Javascript libary
A public-domain software library for working with HXL data in inside a web browser using Javascript.

Not yet updated for 1.0 beta

HXL PHP libary
A public-domain software library for working with HXL data in the PHP programming language.
HXL Java library
A public-domain software library for working with HXL data in the Java programming language.
